summary: Love Nightingale armor and love texture replaces, but don\'t want to use just one at a time? This mod lets you use up to 4 Nightingale armor retextures at the same time!
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/IceburgModding][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15827-1-1349192119.png[/img][/url][/center]
Love Nightingale armor and love texture replaces, but don\'t want to use just one at a time? This mod lets you use up to 4 Nightingale armor retextures at the same time!

NOTE 1: READ the install instructions! Otherwise this mod won\'t work for you!

NOTE 2: This IS NOT a texture replacer. This allows you to use multiple OTHER texture replacers at the same time. It won\'t override any files. I DO NOT take credit for the texture replacers used in the sample image. To get those texture replacers, follow one of the links below:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=669 ] Assassins Creed Nightingale retexture by joplay2999 [/url]  
[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2166] Spider-man Nightingale armor retexture Male and Female by Psychotic Ninja [/url]  
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1038 ] Sub Hero Nightingale Armor by Katalys [/url]  
[url= http://modsreloaded.com/nightingale-prime] Nightingale Prime  by Satyr Zerofrost [/url]  


If you like this mod, be sure to check out my own texture replacers: [url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11167]Daedric Blue Weapons[/url]  and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3775]Daedric Blue Armor[/url]  

Thank you!

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002745[/img]

Merge the \'Data\' folder with the \'Data\' folder in your Skyrim folder.  
Tick on \"AK- Multiple Nightingale Armors\"
This adds 3 new versions of un-enchanted Nightingale Armor to Nightingale Hall. (See picture).
Now the fun part. Navigate to Data\\textures\\armor\\nightingale\\v1 v2 and v3 folders.
Each \"v\" folder is a version of the Nightingale armor and includes a \'m\' (male) folder and \'f\' (female) folder.
Replace the default textures in any of the \'m\' or \'f\' folders with the texture replacer of your choice.
Profit!

(Personally, I plan on giving a different set of nightingale armor to each of my companions!) :D

*If you\'re having any trouble with the install, shoot me a comment and I\'ll try to help you out.

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002750[/img]

Uninstall: Data\\textures\\armor\\nightingale\\v1 v2 and v3 folders
And Data\\meshes\\ armor\\nightingale\\v1 v2 and v3 folders

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002749[/img]
If you\'re having trouble or have a question,  just let me know in the comments section!

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002748[/img]

I am currently not posting any mods on Steam Workshop. If you see one of my mods on Steam Workshop, please report the file to me. 
Thanks! :D
author: Iceburg
